title: First Look: Colnago Revives the Rim Brake with a New C68 for Old Times’ Sake
content:
Rim brake aficionados rejoice! The Colnago C68 Rim Brake brings a modern road frame with traditional brakes for the sentimental cyclist.

Read the full article at First Look: Colnago Revives the Rim Brake with a New C68 for Old Times’ Sake on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
